article_text:
Sunday, June 08, 2014 12:28 PM Inappropriate photo? Alert us.

Mayor Steve Fulop tries on the firefighter helmet that was given to him by Fire Chief Darren Rivers and Fire Director Jerry Cala as a welcome gift. The Jersey City Fire Department held a graduation ceremony for 21 new firefighters--two of whom are the first minority female firefighters in the department’s history--and promoted two of its members to captains, at City Hall on Friday, Aug. 9, 2013. Reena Rose Sibayan/The Jersey Journal
